trans-unit.source: How to Use the RapidStart Services Role Implementer Center | Microsoft Docs

seg-source.mrk: How to Use the RapidStart Services Role Implementer Center | Microsoft Docs

target.mrk: Jak používat roli Implementátor služeb RapidStart | Microsoft Docs

trans-unit.source: When you use RapidStart Services, we recommend that you track your work and use the RapidStart Services Implementer Role Center as it provides the correct context for your configuration work.

seg-source.mrk: When you use RapidStart Services, we recommend that you track your work and use the RapidStart Services Implementer Role Center as it provides the correct context for your configuration work.

target.mrk: Při používání služeb RapidStart doporučujeme sledovat vaši práci a používat roli implementátoru služeb RapidStart, protože poskytuje správný kontext pro vaši konfigurační práci.

trans-unit.source: Use the RapidStart Services Implementer Role Center

seg-source.mrk: Use the RapidStart Services Implementer Role Center

target.mrk: Používání role Implementátor služeb RapidStart

trans-unit.source: When you use RapidStart Services, we recommend that you use the RapidStart Services Implementer Role Center as it provides the correct context for your configuration work.

seg-source.mrk: When you use RapidStart Services, we recommend that you use the RapidStart Services Implementer Role Center as it provides the correct context for your configuration work.

target.mrk: Při používání služeb RapidStart doporučujeme používat roli implementátoru služeb RapidStart, protože poskytuje správný kontext pro vaši konfigurační práci.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [To change Role Center](ui-change-basic-settings.md#to-change-role-center).

seg-source.mrk: For more information, see [To change Role Center](ui-change-basic-settings.md#to-change-role-center).

target.mrk: Pro více informací navštivte [Pro změnu Centra rolí](ui-change-basic-settings.md#to-change-role-center).

trans-unit.source: As you continue with your work, you can assign each table the status that reflects where you are in the process.

seg-source.mrk: As you continue with your work, you can assign each table the status that reflects where you are in the process.

target.mrk: Jak budete pokračovat ve své práci, můžete každé tabulce přiřadit stav, který poukazuje na to, kde se v procesu nacházíte.

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[d365fin](includes/d365fin_md.md)] then keeps track of the table status in the **Activities** part on the Role Center.

seg-source.mrk: then keeps track of the table status in the **Activities** part on the Role Center.

target.mrk: poté sleduje stav tabulky v části **Aktivity** v Centru rolí.

trans-unit.source: By default, when you add a table to the configuration worksheet, its status is set to blank.

seg-source.mrk: By default, when you add a table to the configuration worksheet, its status is set to blank.

target.mrk: Ve výchozím nastavení je stav tabulky prázdný, když ji tabulku do konfiguračního listu.

trans-unit.source: This means that configuration of the table has not begun.

seg-source.mrk: This means that configuration of the table has not begun.

target.mrk: To znamená, že konfigurace tabulky ještě nezačala.

trans-unit.source: This is reflected in the **Not Started** count in the **Activities** tile.

seg-source.mrk: This is reflected in the **Not Started** count in the **Activities** tile.

target.mrk: To je ukázáno v počtu **Nezahájeno** v dlaždici **Aktivity**.

trans-unit.source: To update the status of a configuration table

seg-source.mrk: To update the status of a configuration table

target.mrk: Pro aktualizaci stavu konfigurační tabulky

trans-unit.source: Choose the ![Lightbulb that opens the Tell Me feature](media/ui-search/search_small.png "Tell me what you want to do") icon, enter **Configuration Worksheet**, and then choose the related link.

seg-source.mrk: Choose the ![Lightbulb that opens the Tell Me feature](media/ui-search/search_small.png "Tell me what you want to do") icon, enter **Configuration Worksheet**, and then choose the related link.

target.mrk: Vyberte ikonu ![Žárovka, která otevře funkci Řekněte mi](media/ui-search/search_small.png "Řekněte mi, co chcete dělat"), zvolte **Konfigurační sešitu** a poté vyberte související odkaz.

trans-unit.source: Choose the **Edit List** action.

seg-source.mrk: Choose the **Edit List** action.

target.mrk: Zvolte akci **Upravit seznam**.

trans-unit.source: Select a table, and in the **Status** field, choose the appropriate status.

seg-source.mrk: Select a table, and in the **Status** field, choose the appropriate status.

target.mrk: Vyberte tabulku a v poli **Stav** vyberte příslušný stav.

trans-unit.source: Choose the **OK** button.

seg-source.mrk: Choose the **OK** button.

target.mrk: Zvolte tlačítko **OK**.

trans-unit.source: When you return to the Role Center, the tiles in the **Activities** part are updated to reflect your changes.

seg-source.mrk: When you return to the Role Center, the tiles in the **Activities** part are updated to reflect your changes.

target.mrk: Když se vrátíte do Centra rolí, dlaždice v části **Aktivity** se aktualizují, aby ukazovaly vaše změny.

trans-unit.source: To track the status of a configuration project

seg-source.mrk: To track the status of a configuration project

target.mrk: Pro sledování stavu konfiguračního projektu

trans-unit.source: Open the RapidStart Services Role Center.

seg-source.mrk: Open the RapidStart Services Role Center.

target.mrk: Otevřete Centrum rolí služeb RapidStart.

trans-unit.source: In the **Configuration Areas** part, completion statistics are shown for the areas and groups that you have set up.

seg-source.mrk: In the **Configuration Areas** part, completion statistics are shown for the areas and groups that you have set up.

target.mrk: V části **Oblasti konfigurace** se zobrazí statistiky dokončení pro oblasti a skupiny, které jste nastavili.

trans-unit.source: If you have not set up any groups or areas, this part has no data.

seg-source.mrk: If you have not set up any groups or areas, this part has no data.

target.mrk: Pokud jste nenastavili žádné skupiny ani oblasti, tato část neobsahuje žádná data.

trans-unit.source: To see a filtered view of table status

seg-source.mrk: To see a filtered view of table status

target.mrk: Pro zobrazení filtrovaného zobrazení stavu tabulky

trans-unit.source: Choose the **Tables** action.

seg-source.mrk: Choose the **Tables** action.

target.mrk: Zvolte akci **Tabulky**.

trans-unit.source: Select the appropriate filtered view.

seg-source.mrk: Select the appropriate filtered view.

target.mrk: Vyberte vhodné filtrované zobrazení.

trans-unit.source: See Also

seg-source.mrk: See Also

target.mrk: Viz také

trans-unit.source: [Setting Up a Company With RapidStart Services](admin-set-up-a-company-with-rapidstart.md)

seg-source.mrk: Setting Up a Company With RapidStart Services

target.mrk: Založení společnosti pomocí služeb RapidStart

trans-unit.source: [Administration](admin-setup-and-administration.md)

seg-source.mrk: Administration

target.mrk: Správa
